about_the_game:
Welcome to the rhythmic heart of Metroplex Zero. An OST that is as immersive and engaging as the neo-cyberpunk world it underscores. This soundtrack is the perfect companion for those venturing through the labyrinthine metropolis and the intense card battles therein. Crafted meticulously by renowned composers Jean-Alexander Nevskiy and Ian Booms, it serves as an audial embodiment of the pulsating, dystopian world of Metroplex Zero.

Each track in this collection is more than just background music; it's a carefully woven story in sound, designed to accompany you on your journey through this cyberpunk card battler.

"Main Theme" establishes the tone for your adventure, drawing you into the world's menacing allure. Battle themes like "NNZ Battle," "Dark Alley Battle," "Medigeneix Battle," and "ZantoCorp Battle" each encapsulate the distinctive energy of the various MegaCorps you'll be taking on, delivering a thrilling soundscape to strategize and fight against.

The suspenseful notes of "Villainous Plotting" and the resounding beats of "Fearsome Foe" encapsulate the danger lurking in every corner of the city, while "Exploring the Metroplex" and "Metroplex Zero" mirror the intrigue and fascination of navigating a sprawling cybernetic metropolis.

Finally, the unique "Digital Saint [Bonus]" with haunting Russian vocals completes the soundtrack, serving as a striking reflection of the game's multifaceted character.

Every track, every note, serves to enhance your experience as you assemble your team, customize your deck, and prepare to take on the formidable MegaCorps. This soundtrack is not just an accompaniment to your journey but an essential part of the Metroplex Zero world, echoing its narrative beats and the depths of its cyberpunk soul.

Produced and imagined by Enigma Dragons, this OST is an audial adventure in itself, waiting for you to hit play. Dive into the neo-cyberpunk beats of Metroplex Zero, where every note is a story, and every melody is a part of your battle.
